name: Snow Way Out
description:
Fend off the attacking snowmen & reach the end of the cave by using your body parts as projectile weapons. Be sure you don't run out.

WASD/LS to move, LMB/A to attack

Created for GameCraft: An Incredibyule end of year jam

  • Chris McHugh - Code
  • Keith O'Malley - Music
  • Jazheel Luna - Art, Level Design
  • Siobhan Hardt - Art
